nodes.message: dinnerserved is reset everyday in the NightTransition script

nodes.name: Supper on Day five of my Incarceration
nodes.description:
Today's meal was from a dish from West Fricana... some sort of stew that was so hot, I drank a gallon of water. And I had second helpings. The crunchy things called 'dodo' were tasty, too.

Supper went smoothly, but the others didn't appreciate my "You can't reach a cold grog through bricks" joke. I thought it was hilarious.

nodes.text: Nobody's around to talk to...
This is great! We have a free day all to ourselves.
If we don't stop the thief, every day will be a free day. I really don't want to be expelled over this issue.
So what are we supposed to do about it? The thief comes out at night. It's not like we're going to stop him during the day. So why not take advantage of our free time?
Do what you like, but I'm going to get some traps and try to find a good place to catch the thief. We don't have a lot of time to waste on this.
You do that - go save the world for us all. Be our hero! The rest of us will go off to have some fun.
Everyone else is off doing other stuff.
So, a free day without the impending doom of the school thief stealing our class away. We should enjoy ourselves.
I'll be heading into town to do some shopping for new shoes. I need some that can hold up while I explore the seashore for sea caves. Want to join me, Esme?
No, I vill be doing other things today.
I will be going to Caligari today too to do some research. I can accompany you there, if you like.
<shrug> Sure, why not?
As for you, Mr. O'Conner - try not to get kicked out of school while we're gone. I don't want to miss Terk's fireworks when he does it.

nodes.message: TODO: Maybe flesh out this day off?

nodes.text: I guess everyone else has places to go and things to do. I'd better find something for me to do or this break is going to be really boring.

nodes.message: TODO: Maybe flesh out this day off?

nodes.text: Wow, this place is really deserted today.

nodes.message: TODO: Maybe flesh out this day off?

nodes.text: It's kind of lonely around here. I'm almost looking forward to class tomorrow.
All these ghosts floating around here make it hard to eat - It's hard to hold a fork when your hands are trembling.
Even the spicy food tastes cold when there are chills running down your spine from all the nearby ghosts.
At least in the morning we can eat in peace without all the ghosts hanging around.
It's nice that there's no Disbarred Bard class this morning, but I'll need to remember to go to my elective class this afternoon. I think there might be a test.
Everyone is still on edge, even though there haven't been any Drats around.
Everyone is on edge with all the Drats running around the castle.

nodes.message: TODO: Maybe flesh out this day off?

nodes.text: Where is everyone? Why would anyone get up early on a day off? Then again, maybe they sleep in over breakfast.
I need to eat as much as this good food as I can before the semester ends. I'm going to miss it.
